ai-patthana21.27:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, namely, discussing the extent of the Teaching,
ai-patthana21.27:1.1_0: or cause or reason for teaching.
ai-patthana21.27:1.1_1: Not for the sake of teaching,
ai-patthana21.27:1.1_2: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana21.27:1.1_3: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.27:2.1_0: or cause mortals have no cause or reason for this reason.
ai-patthana21.27:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.27:3.1_0: or cause or reason for teaching it is not limitless,
ai-patthana21.27:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
